body:
Installing openmpi fails

### Expected Result

openmpi is installed with gcc

### Actual Result

Build fails with error

```
  mpool_memkind.h:57:40: error: ‘MEMKIND_NUM_BASE_KIND’ undeclared here (not in a function)
```

See the log files.

[spack-build.env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1785368/spack-build.env.txt)
[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1785369/spack-build.out.txt)


### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install openmpi
```

### Information on your system

I am using the system default gcc 4.8.5 on CentOS 7.
title: openmpi fails to compile
